subject: College Athletics
Football
lead_paragraph: University of Oklahoma’s Sooners finished 11-3 last season and lost four of its last five bowl games, the worst such steak in team history. Yet Oklahoma’s rabid fans want more.
snippet: University of Oklahoma’s Sooners finished 11-3 last season and lost four of its last five bowl games, the worst such steak in team history. Yet Oklahoma’s rabid fans want more.
